item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 12/2014
item.description: Including: Alan Jackson, David Myles, Garcia / Grisman / Rice, Hey Joe, Los Prolijos, Noam Pikelny, Pharis And Jason Romero, Robert Earl Keen, Special Consensus, Stringbean.
